name: Eggs Shoot Adventure
description:
Eggs Adventure - This is jungle version of bubble shoot game. This game is very cool and suitable for all age.
There are three playing mode (classic, puzzle). They are totally different playing styles.

How To Play:
+ Tap on the screen to shoot the bubble in that direction
+ To group 3 or more bubbles to make them bust
+ Clear all the bubbles on the screen to level up and try to get 3 stars on each level.
